column3: Weight (1=completely unimportant, 2= unimportant, 3= indifferent, 4= important, 5=absolutely important)
column4: Confidence  (1=very low, 2= low, 3= half sure, 4= high, 5=very high)

column5: Some of the sentences are no real sentences. One problem seems to be that you seperated at punctuation that don't mark sentence endings.
"these students" and "They may also have taken other disciplinary actions.". In "Yes, I am an official at this school." it is also not clear who is talking.
